hauptSatz.zeile2: Your trustworthy freelance partner for all projects concerning Electronic Data Interchange & interfaces.

services.zeile3: Optimized communication with your customers and suppliers. For learning how you can automate the exchange of data with our high-performance Business Integration Platform
services.card1-b: Development, operation and in-house support; we can also provide ad-hoc services outside of release cycles.
services.card2-b: EDI conversion, signing service, archiving service, validation service, file transfer service, capture services, reporting... etc.
services.card3-b: We offer maximum transparency in terms of security and process safety through encryptions, databases and operating systems.

EDI with Lobster: Consulting, profile development, process implementations & development of individual EDI/EAI/API services with Lobster _data (3.x & 4.x), Lobster _data Portal & Lobster _scm, as well as workshops & trainings.
EDI with Seeburger: Consulting, mapping development & implementation, real-time connection of applications, cloud services, control of internal and external business processes as well as process designer Seeburger BIS/BIC 5.x & 6.
EDI Project Management: Requirements management external/internal partners, systems (EAI), pre-/ after-sales support, conceptual design, documentation EDI interfaces & processes as well as analysis and creation of EDI guidelines.
Conception & Documentation: Creation of so-called 'paper mappings' (mapping descriptions hand in hand with your specialist departments) as well as creation of documentation EDI interfaces & processes.
Communication Channels: Tuning, setup and testing of remote communications and connections such as HTTP(S), FTP(S), AS2, X.400, AS400 Dataqueue, LDAP, SMTP, POP3, IMAP, database connections, OFTP(2) or VAN (e.g. GXS).
Performance: High processing speed of large files as well as many short messages, Load balancing capabilities with failover and configuration options (HA concept).
Data Formats: Data formats such as EDIFACT, Tradacoms, ZUGFeRD, XML, CSV, Excel, FixRecord, database queries, BWA, JSON, CARGO-IMP etc... As well as templates such as VDA, SAP IDoc, ANSI X.12 and more than 9,000 EDIFACT templates with secure transmission.
IT Support & Consulting: Extensive IT Know-how, experience in client services, system first and second level as well as EDI clearing and support, branch Know-how: Logistics, Industry & Trade, Automotive.

Stefan Endler: Head of SAP/BPM - ROTHENBERGER Werkzeuge GmbH

With Mr. Schäfer we have a very good consultant who supports us in our developments around the electronic customers and supplier connection fast, factually correct and unbureaucratic. With his high level of commitment, the cooperation is always fun and leads to the expected results.
Patrik Kluge: Global Head of IT Systems and Development - dservice GmbH

Very professional and friendly manner, the cooperation with Mr. Philippe Schäfer is established on very solid basis. His expert knowledge in the topics EDI, EAI and their implementation in Lobster is a great help. We are looking forward to future projects!
Project manager: The best thing about working with Mr. Schäfer is his availability and quick support in urgent matters. Also, his Know-how helps us in the implementation of various projects, as he shows us different ways to reach our goal in ways that we didn't see possible. This is another reason why the implementations from his part take place without any problems. Furthermore, his friendly and helpful nature is also a reason why we like to work with him for a long time and will continue to do so.

hauptSatz.solutions: Choosing the right EDI solution for your company is quite difficult, as there is a wide range of choices available on the market, here are some of the popular EDI solutions that we provide and support:

card1.title: Who has time for complicated?
card1.subTitle: Lobster _data
card1.description: Data conversion. Data mapping. Data manipulation. Transfer your data to your target system. No crossing your fingers. No holding your breath. No worries. With lobster_data.

card2.title: Fullest support
card2.subTitle: Allgemeines EDI/IT
card2.description: Present concepts that all deal with the interaction of different parts of the IT landscape of one or more related companies.

card3.title: Your Central Platform for Digital Transformation
card3.subTitle: Seeburger BIS
card3.description: SEEBURGER Business Integration Suite – The Hybrid Integration Platform One Platform for Full Life Cycle API Management and Any Integration Requirement.
seeburger: Migration Experience BIS5 / BIS6 incl. Mappings

lobster.name: Get to know Lobster_data, the software for electronic data integration (EDI). In just 60 seconds. With EDI, a company can communicate electronically with its customers and suppliers in a cost-saving manner. Are you interested in smooth EDI processes? Then go ahead: Get information now.

seeburger.name: Disparate applications and legacy B2B landscapes are holding your business back. What companies need is a holistic foundation, a single platform that can handle all of your business integration and file transfer needs and is fully integrated to SAP.

projects.zeile1: we turn your business Projects into reality
projects.zeile2: Our real work begins after implementing the project represented by providing the highest levels of support.
projects.zeile4: In addition to technology, we are happy to place our know-how and many years of experience in project management at your disposal and ensure that your business runs smoothly from planning to implementation.

about.zeile2: Our experience is the result of years of direct work in project management and implementation, in addition to our professionalism in dealing with the management of daily problems.

aboutNav.description: easy2edi Schäfer is a startup that provides electronic data exchange services and other information technology services, that are based on wide and practical experiences in the labor market
history: Reason for foundation: fed up with being employed
aboutNav.vision: We intend to provide our customers with the best EDI services experience from beginning to end, with a fast, remotely support, easy-to-follow instructions, clear and secure connection methods, and fast, quality delivery.
